data.title: Which among the following is the official currency of Albania?
data.meta_description: Lek The Albanian lek is the official currency of Albania The 20192022 series of Albanian Lek banknotes are made of synthetic polymer The Albanian Lek was named after Alexander the great
data.text:
Q. Which among the following is the official currency of Albania?

Answer: Lek

Notes: The Albanian lek is the official currency of Albania. The 2019-2022 series of Albanian Lek banknotes are made of synthetic polymer. The Albanian Lek was named after Alexander, the great.

3
